author: newsr.in
title: Amazon’s AWS outage takes down Netflix, Reddit, Medium, and more
text: Good morning! Did you notice any apps not working on your phone? Perhaps no Netflix? That’s because for the past few hours, Amazon Web Services has been undergoing a widespread outage. At its worst, about 31 services were affected including Netflix, Amazon Instant Video, Nest, Reddit, Medium, IMDB, Social Flow, and Amazon’s own Alexa, among […] »
